title: 2 bed 1 bath apartment close to light rail! 1885 Jackson
posting_body: Comfortable 2 bed 1 bath apartment close to light rail, easy access to Downtown!
Don't miss out on this gem!
Comfortable 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment located within walking distance of the light rail and easy access to I-25 to get Downtown if needed.
The apartment features a washer and dryer in the unit, off street parking and is close to Wash Park, and the University of Denver campus.
***We are looking for 2.5x's the rent in verifiable income, 2 years of good rental history and we also check credit and criminal background.
If there is an issue in any area you may be required to pay a higher deposit if approved.
There is a $40 application fee per adult.
